book.synopsis: The master travel writer provides an insightful account of his odysses down the length of Africa, from Cairo to South Africa, aboard a dilapidated bus, ancient train, and rusty steamer, describing the bad food, many delays, discomforts, and dangers of his trip , along with the colorful people and places of the real Africa.
book.title_long: Dark Star Safari: Overland from Cairo to Cape Town
book.dimensions: Height: 9.5 Inches, Length: 6.5 Inches, Weight: 1.8 Pounds, Width: 1.5 Inches
